body_html:
FYI, Xilinx has DNN accelerators now. Currently they are integrated with Caffe. I'm sure tensorflow is on the roadmap. http://www.datacenterknowledge.com/archives/2016/11/14/xilinx-unleashes-fpga-accelerator-stack-supporting-caffe-openstack/
…

body:
FYI, Xilinx has DNN accelerators now. Currently they are integrated with Caffe. I'm sure tensorflow is on the roadmap. 
http://www.datacenterknowledge.com/archives/2016/11/14/xilinx-unleashes-fpga-accelerator-stack-supporting-caffe-openstack/


Sent from my iPhone
